verses.roman:
vṛndāvana yāite kaila gauḍere gamana
pratāparudra kaila pathe vividha sevana

synonyms: vṛndāvana yāite—to go to Vṛndāvana; kaila—did; gauḍere—to Bengal; gamana—going; pratāparudra—King Pratāparudra; kaila—performed; pathe—on the road; vividha—various; sevana—services.
translation: To visit Vṛndāvana, the Lord went to Gauḍa-deśa [Bengal]. On the way, King Pratāparudra performed a variety of service to please the Lord.
